pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Princeton University Libraries, Rare Books and Special Collections
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains radio scripts designed to sway public opinion during World War II and the post World War II era, including Our Secret Weapon with Rex Stout as the "lie detective" debunking Axis propaganda, Freedom House Forum and Pride and Prejudice, a forum for representatives of different races and religions to discuss issues of prejudice.
